website_summaries.verdict: Both amateurs and pros find this affordable package to be very useful. The best value for the lowest price.
pros: Includes a tripod and padded case
cons: The audible accuracy alert (a beeping sound) is annoying to some owners

customer_reviews.title: The Cube #D Laser Level is a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on laundry remodel project. Hanging photos in a perfect straight line, there is nothing that works better than a self-leveling laser level! I installed it on my camera tripod, but it also comes with a clamp and small base. Great purchase and my wife is so happy everything is straight! ;)
customer_reviews.author: TURBODRIVER24

customer_reviews.title: Useless for exterior projects
customer_reviews.text: Adirpro works fine,but for what I needed was useless. I try trace a line in a wood base where i setup my shed and I want a straight line for screwed my shed to the base. Well the line was impossible to see it in the base with a cloudy day...
customer_reviews.author: Leca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, rapid delivery and bright compact unit. Two vertical beams is very handy. Customer service is superb!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Simple, small, inexpensive, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I had to adhesive install 120 2x2 ceiling drop in acoustical panels on the ceiling in several office rooms for sound deadening. Ugh, I think this device saved me about 3-4 hours of extra work. paid for itself rather quickly. Right, it works great on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used could still be improved
customer_reviews.text: It's the best I've used but would be nice if u could control the height without having to move it
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Not a pro version, a DIY product.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good starter laser level, at farther distances the laser line breaks up not a crisp tight solid line. The tripod is fair as well, not very sturdy but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: EDGE

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any immediate use for this, but the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Simple, Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!! Very well designed durable little cube! Such a wonderful thing to keep in the toolbox! Lasers are bright and the additional vertical side laser is a nice feature. Turning off the device locks the gimbal that the laser ape rapture is on so the bumps and drops don’t damage the self leveling components.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Popowski

customer_reviews.title: It’s loud but works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. However the “scream” it emits when it’s moved is deafening. Ability to adjust would be a great add on
customer_reviews.author: CDP

customer_reviews.title: Works great and appears to be very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it all the time. Works great and appears to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stahley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it inside but does not work outside unless it dark outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Digustingly corroded batteries
customer_reviews.text: The level itself was fine but the included batteries were old and corroded so when I opened the package they fell apart and gross dust went everywhere. Sellers need to check their battery supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Blethen

customer_reviews.title: No Line Lock Setting & No Magnetic Clamp
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in and around steel equipment. +/- 1/16" accuracy @ 30ft is excellent for our applications. Overall rating of 3 stars is because former (2016-2018) versions of product offered a laser line lock setting and a right-angle magnetic metal positioning clamp. Laser line lock feature reduced line movement from vibrations and allowed use of level in any orientation without emitting audible alarm. Right angle magnetic clamp was very helpful when positioning level in or on steel equipment or components.
customer_reviews.author: eyerateu

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this seller was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in law. He loves this product. My experience with this seller was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kaiser

product_meta.title: AdirPro Cube Cross Line Laser Level |Professional Self-Levelling Instrument with ±3°Accuracy Horizontal & Vertical Beams (Professional)
feature_bullets: PRECISE AND ACCURATE: Get highly accurate levelling for all your DIY, home repair and construction projects with this professional, extremely effective cube laser level. Featuring 2 perpendicular line beams (1 horizontal and 1 vertical) both with 90° coverage and an impressive accuracy of ±1/16 inch at 30 feet (± 2mm at 10), this premium quality, self-levelling instrument is a must-have for hanging mirrors, pictures, laying floor tiles or framing out new walls easily and fast!

WORK ANYWHERE: Thanks to its quick, pendulum self-levelling system with a vertical accuracy range of only ±3° and a working range of 66 ft, this level is perfect for intersecting layouts that require right angles. Compact and lightweight, with an auto locking system, it’s easy to carry with you anywhere. (Note: This unit cannot be used with a laser detector!) Environmental class: IP54

CHOOSE YOUR PACKAGE: Together with your cross line laser you will also receive a convenient, soft bag cover for easy transport and safe storage of the unit, three AAA batteries and a user manual to help you get started right away. Looking for a complete kit to let you work like a pro? Then pick our Professional Edition to get an telescoping 3" tripod, or the Ultimate Edition to get an additional wall mount, laser glasses and hard carrying case, as well!

GET THE BEST VALUE FOR YOUR MONEY: Not all laser levels are created equal. Make sure you choose the best and keep your laser level for years to come! Boasting a durable, plastic housing that ensures maximum protection of the laser beams and pendulum levelling system inside the unit and a slip-proof, ribbed rubber casing to keep your device scratch-free at all times, this is a safe purchase that will go without a hitch for a really long time.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Complete all your levelling tasks with unmatched ease and flawless precision or we’ll refund your purchase! Backed by a 2-year manufacturer’s warranty, you have nothing to lose! So what are you waiting for? Order yours today and make all your DIY projects a breeze. WITH LASER PROJECTION- 1H 1V, Laser Diode - Class 2, 635 nm, <1 mWt. **Prop 65 Warning - Lead and DEHP**
